name: KGFVideo
0:
”Alexa, open KGF video”
”Alexa, ask KGF video to play a video”
”Alexa, ask KGF video what is k. g. f.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: k. g. f. video
des:
Disclaimer: The skill content is in Japanese .
The recorded session of the previous Kirirom Global Forum in one place. You won't miss a chance to listen to an insightful speech on various topic from many successful people in this event. At the Kirirom Global Forum is an event which entrepreneurs, investors, engineers, business people, educators, and government officials from around the world connect together across national borders, industries, and industry boundaries to raise important issues and discuss directions of the solution. Together with the participants, we will think about what Japan can do to demonstrate leadership globally.
In particular, KGF2022 is based on the concept of providing high-quality stimulation to Japan, which has become even more inward due to the corona disaster. Online delivery of all 40 sessions on key topics by 150 key players in global business, education, social issues and cutting-edge technology. We look forward to your participation. 
The Kirirom Global Forum will be held for the 9th time at KGF2022, and you can watch the recordings of the events held so far.

===============================================================================================
Kirirom Global Forum 2022 is on the way!
[Date] April 29th (Friday) -May 5th (Thursday), 2022
[Venue] Online delivery
[Application] Please apply for participation (free of charge) from https://2022.kgforum.info/.

Find out more: https://kgforum.info/
